name: Verstappen Kart v1.00 (FINAL)
description:
Long long ago, in the island of Maxania, lived a mythical creature with over 20 heads. Its name was Max, Max Verstappen. Fast forward to the present, Max Verstappen has reincarnated as an F1 driver. Unfortunately, the poor soul has started losing his heads once again. 

Use the MAX MOBILE to recollect Max's heads in the fastest time possible!

NOW FEATURING A NEW MAP and 4 NEW SONGS!
